level.heading: Contempt.
level.text: Nothing in this subchapter shall interfere with or prevent the exercise by any court of the United States of its power to punish for contempt.

level.heading: History
level.text: (July 29, 1970, 84 Stat. 649, Pub. L. 91-358, title II, ยง 210(a).)

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Contempt power of Superior Court, see ยง 11-944.
